actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-886.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the concurrent resolution H. Con. Res. 307 setting forth the congressional budget for the United States Government for the fiscal years 1981, 1982, and 1983 and revising the congressional budget for the United States Government for the fiscal year 1980.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.Con.Res. 307 (Congressional budgets, fiscal years 1981-1983, and revised budget, fiscal year 1980).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the concurrent resolution H. Con. Res. 307 setting forth the congressional budget for the United States Government for the fiscal years 1981, 1982, and 1983 and revising the congressional budget for the United States Government for the fiscal year 1980.
